task.title: Registering an Application
task.shortdesc: Register an application so that you can request access to an API in the API Catalog.

step.cmd: From the Developer Portal, click Applications to go to the Applications page.

step.info: The maximum length of characters for Application Name is 64 characters.

step.cmd: Enter a description. The description has a character limit of 250 characters.
Specify whether the application is enabled or disabled.
Enter an Application Owner name and email address.
step.info: The Application Owner is the person within your organization who owns the application and controls the active API Key.

step.cmd: Enter the phone number, company name, and company web address for the Application Owner.

taskbody.postreq: To edit the application, click on the Application Name and make your changes to the Application Name, Description, Application Status, or Application Owner fields, and click Update.
